title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Systematic Instructional Methods for Understanding Fraction-Decimal Relationships

learning_goals: One can accurately explain the positional relationships between fractions and decimals using a number line model with over 80% accuracy

Can apply fraction-to-decimal conversion skills to solve problems in real-life contexts (e.g., calculating discounts)
